audioText: Son nom n'apparaît nulle part sur ce tour de garde et ça me semble étrange.
question: What seems strange about the schedule?
options: His name doesn't appear anywhere on the duty roster
The schedule is written in a different language
There are too many people assigned to each shift
The timing of the shifts is confusing
explanation: The text states 'Son nom n'apparaît nulle part sur ce tour de garde et ça me semble étrange' - His name doesn't appear anywhere on this duty roster and that seems strange to me. This targets the nouns 'nom' and 'tour' in the context of work scheduling.
